Discovered repositories from the open source frontier

View the Project on GitHub

facebookresearch/fast3r

Reconstructs 3D scenes from 1000+ images in one forward pass

View on index

Related repos

  • VGGT is a neural network that predicts 3D scene attributes like camera parameters, depth, and point maps from images
  • PyTorch models for high-res vision tasks using self-supervised learning
  • Perceives 3D scenes from videos and photo collections with a persistent state
  • Video models like SlowFast help computers spot actions and understand what’s happening in videos by combining slow and fast motion cues
  • video and image watermarking code for training and inference
  • tracks any pixel in video with transformer-based model, supports dense and long-term point tracking even through occlusion
  • segment anything in images and videos with sam2
  • Reconstructs 3D humans from photo collections without tuning
  • data augmentations for audio, image, text, and video
  • Library for video understanding research
